content.question: For which of the following values of <math alttext="b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> does <math alttext="the integral from 2 to b, of, open parenthesis, 2 x minus 3, close parenthesis, d x equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></math> ?

topic.text: 6.7: The Fundamental Theorem of Calculus and Definite Integrals
